title: Capital punishment not cruel and unusual punishment

content.prompt: The Supreme Court has ruled which of the following concerning the death penalty?

choices.label: A state may not impose the death penalty on a noncitizen.
Lethal injection is the only constitutionally acceptable method of execution.
The death penalty is not necessarily cruel and unusual punishment.
The death penalty violates the Fifth Amendment of the Constitution.
